description:
If you are new to Fiverr, this is the only course you need to take.

Learn from instructors who have actually made money on Fiverr. Whether you'd like to start a successful Fiverr business or whether you're just looking to create an extra stream of income online, this course has what you need to do both.

This course is designed to get you started quickly so we've already come up with 15 proven gig templates for you to use. The video tutorials are hands-on and will guide you through each step.

Watch over our shoulders as we guide you though:

  • Setting up your free Fiverr account
  • Creating your first Fiverr gigs using our proven examples
  • Selling your Fiverr gigs and earning your first of many dollars to come...

Besides the Basics:

We will also explore what kinds of gigs sell really well on Fiverr and we'll cover several advanced features and ninja tricks that will give you a competitive edge against other sellers on Fiverr. We will teach you how to EFFECTIVELY use the 'gig extras' feature so you can get paid a lot more than $5 on each of your gigs.

If you are looking for a way to make extra cash doing something you are good at, Fiverr is the right place you. Start as a newbie and graduate as a Fiverr expert.

Our Personal Guarantee:

As always, you have 30 days to test drive this course should you choose to keep it you will get unlimited lifetime access to any revisions, instructor support and access to our VIP discounts to any new courses we create in the future - you will be the first to know and get in at the best price.

Enroll in the course today, and let's get you started on making money!
title: Fiverr for Newbies: 15 Gig Templates To Copy & Get paid fast
instructors: Sergey Kasimov, Jewel Tolentino & Auret Esselen
